content.html:
It's on my blog: http://blog.pawelsobczak.pl
One of my readers send me a feedback with troubles with openid.pl
I registered at it to check the problem, because other sites (like myopenid.com) works fine.
This is the URL with error:http://wklej.org/id/d37b8aa5c6 (it's only link to the URL, because the latter is too long)
Is it possible that openid.pl uses different 'standard' that plugin doesn't operate?
